1: <pb/><t>Q'uqlite Dyos toj tkawb'il toj kya'j</t> <t>ex nchaq'un kyib'aju' ajkawil kjalu:</t>
2: <t>¿Ma kukx nxi' kypoqo'nju'ye' tuk'i'l chajyolil</t> <t>ex q'o'n kyib'e' kukxju' kyuk'i'l b'inchal myab'a'n?</t>
3: <t>¡Kyb'inchame' tnik'alilti'j teju' numjni ex teju' meb'a!</t> <t>¡Kyb'inchame' tnik'alilti'j teju' prow ex teju' ati nojqelan te!</t>
4: <t>¡Che kyklomju'ye' mixti' kyipumal ex prow,</t> <t>che kyklome' toj kyq'ob'ju' b'inchal taq'wix!</t>
5: <pb/><t>Aye'tzunkye' min nb'ant kyu'ne', min nok toj kywi'ye';</t> <t>toj qxopin nche b'eta'ye'.</t> <t>Inxi'x yukchi tx'otx' kyu'ne' ex mixti'x nkych'exb'e'n kynab'le'.</t>
6: <t>Nmaye' qa dyos qe'ye';</t> <t>ex kykyaqilxe' nk'walqe'ye' ayine' Dyos te toj kya'j.</t>
7: <t>Tu'npetzunju', che kyimele' kse'nqe' kykyaqil xjal,</t> <t>¡che b'eltz'aqe' kse'n jun nimaqkawil min xkawin b'a'n! Chi Dyos.</t>
8: <pb/><t>¡Atzun Nman Dyos, tzajku'ya kawil twitz tx'otx',</t> <t>a na'ta kyajaw kykyaqilju' nimaqtnam! Chiju' b'itzal.</t>
